**Data Import Process**

```{r}
install.packages("readxl")
library("readxl")
TUIK <- read_excel("C:\\Users\\ryigi\\Desktop\\Data-Analysis-Project\\TUIK-Endeks.xlsx")
#Then to save it as .RData
save(TUIK, file = "TUIK.RData")
load("TUIK.RData")

```
